Choose 'create a new wallet' in the app: Choose 'create a new wallet' in the app
Name each individual wallet if you need: Name each individual wallet if you need more than one
Create a passphrase for each wallet. You: Create a passphrase for each wallet. You'll need it for depositing collateral, placing trades, etc.
Record the recovery phrase that's provid: Record the recovery phrase that's provided on setup. This only appears once. Have an existing wallet you created in the CLI app? You will be given the option to connect this to the desktop app
Need to restore a wallet? Use the recove: Need to restore a wallet? Use the recovery phrase exactly as it was presented to you
To update the app, delete your existing: To update the app, delete your existing version and download the new one
Download the Vega Wallet desktop app, to: Download the Vega Wallet desktop app, to help you manage multiple wallets, multiple keys — and get access to the Vega network.
Access Vega apps, such as the token site: Access Vega apps, such as the token site and Console
It's also the starting point for trading: It's also the starting point for trading, staking tokens, and voting on community proposals.
